game.name: Blaze Monster Machines Crush
game.description:
Blaze Monster Machines Crush game can be your first choice to kill time especially if you are interested to play with Monster trucks. Multiple types of trucks coupled with high score system and easy controls will keep you glued to the screen for many hours. All it takes is to slide the mouse or tap the screen to connect three or more same trucks to disappear from the screen. Your every successful effort will reward you with some points. Join this new arcade fun challenge to know how many points you can secure!

Be careful and try to find out as many same trucks as you can to score bigger in the shortest possible time as it is a time-based game! The timer will keep running and you can see it at the top of the screen. It will be amazing to enjoy the wonderful special pictures with trucks and cars in this cute html5 boys game. Keep moving trucks from up to down, left to right or in a diagonal direction to eliminate the maximum number of vehicles from the screen! The more trucks you eliminate, the higher score you will be able to make.

Use the mouse on PC or tap the screen on a mobile phone to remove the trucks in this one of the best monster trucks games for kids! You can play this matching game on desktop, mobile phone, tablet and iPad or iPhone. Refresh your page if required to keep your game running properly in case if you are stuck at the first time! If you feel bored, try out another match 3 games from the category of arcade games that are also free to play online without download. Good luck to create the best score and have fun with your friends!
